channel.title: NFTs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NFTs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Melania Trump’s AI Era Is Upon Us
item.description: The ever elusive first lady has emerged with a brief to exert thought leadership over AI, for the children. Some insiders are excited; others won’t touch the subject with a 10-foot pole.
